folder: Henry Street & Huntington Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Henry Street, east side, north from Huntington Street. The buildings are being torn down for the widening of Hamilton Avenue--one block to the east --and its reconstruction into a link in the Belt Parkway system of roads.

October, 1940

P. L. Sperr

folder: Huntington Street & Henry Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
75 Huntington Street, adjoining the N. W. corner of Henry Street, showing a very old frame house, probably dating back to pre-Revolutionary days.

P. L. Sperr

October 23, 1940
